short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate specific words on a webpage to the student's language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension will provide Hebrew speaking students with the translation of Lego Spike Page command blocks, to engage in a more friendly manner.
